text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: tense family gathering, emotional>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Pulcheria: “What do I do now?”
Razumihin: “Act on Avdotya’s decision.”
Pulcheria: “Rodya will come if he knows!”

---
<setup: anxious discussion, worried expressions>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Pulcheria: “She insists Rodya must be here!”
Razumihin: “He was not himself yesterday.”
Avdotya: “We must prevent him from coming.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Pulcheria Alexandrovna is distressed about how to handle Rodya's impending visit, fearing his reaction and the implications of a letter from Pyotr Petrovitch.
